text: 1:25 Jon 13:17; Rom 8:2; 2 Korin 3:18; Jems 2:12Ezɨ Godɨn Akar bar deravɨra itim e gamima e fɨriaghɨrɨ. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba deravɨra Akar kam gɨnɨghnɨgh, egh pura Akam baragh zuamɨra okɨnɨghnɨghan kogh, bar an Akamɨn gɨn mangɨtɨ, gumazamizir kaba, God men ingangaribar amutɨ da bar deravɨram otivam.
